title: The true discription of a royall masque Presented at Hampton Court, vpon Sunday night, being the eight of Ianuary. 1604. And personated by the Queenes most excellent Majestie, attended by eleuen ladies of honour.
author: Daniel, Samuel, 1562-1619.
publisher: Printed by Edward Allde, and are to be solde at the Long Shoppe, adjoyning vnto S. Mildreds Church in the Poultrye,
notes: An unauthorized edition according to the epistle in STC 6265.--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
